one.question: How long does it take to go live on Zidni AI?
one.answer: Most educators launch within 7 days with our onboarding sprint, including catalog migration and payment setup.

two.question: Do I need my own website or tenant first?
two.answer: No. Zidni AI can host your storefront or connect to an existing tenantâ€”our team will guide the right setup.

three.question: What support do I get after launch?
three.answer: Growth tier and above include quarterly strategy reviews, weekly office hours and campaign templates on demand.

four.question: Can larger teams collaborate in one workspace?
four.answer: Yes. Scale tier workspaces include role-based permissions, shared analytics and CRM integrations for your staff.

terms.title: Terms of Use Agreement
terms.welcome: Welcome to the Zidni (Zidni AI) family!
terms.intro: We are happy to have you with us. Our goal at Zidni is to provide the best learning experience for you and your students. To keep the service stable and fast, please review the simple rules below:

sections.title: 1. Our relationship
sections.body: By creating your account, we consider you our partner and you agree to these terms. We keep improving the platform, so we may update these terms to deliver better features. We will always notify you of any important changes that affect you.

sections.title: 2. Your video journey on Zidni
items: Automatic quality optimization: To ensure students can watch smoothly even on weak connections, our system adjusts video quality automatically (up to 720p or 1080p depending on your plan).
Smart storage management: Once your video is processed and ready for streaming, we delete the original raw file to make room for new uploads. Keep your original copy on your device for reference.
Storage capacity: Each plan includes a storage allowance by hours or words. If you need more, you can upgrade your plan or add extra storage at any time.

sections.title: 3. Viewing and consumption experience
items: Watch minutes: You get a generous monthly quota of viewing minutes. If students use it up, you can add extra minutes to keep learning going.
Fair use: To keep the platform stable for everyone, we enforce fair-use policies that prevent abnormal load on our servers.

sections.title: 4. Your intellectual property
items: Your content is yours: We are simply the home for hosting your knowledge. Every video or file you upload remains fully yours; Zidni has no rights to it.
Your responsibility: Please ensure you own the rights to the materials you upload. Legal responsibility for content rests with the uploader.

sections.title: 5. Subscription and payment
items: Auto-renewal: Your subscription renews automatically to avoid service interruption. If you wish to stop, you can do so in account settings at least 24 hours before renewal.
Payment policy: Because we reserve server resources and begin processing immediately upon subscription, payments are non-refundable. You still receive the full value of your subscription period.

sections.title: 6. Keeping the Zidni community safe
sections.body: We are committed to a safe learning environment. We do not accept content that violates laws or public morals. In rare cases, we may suspend accounts that abuse the system in ways that harm others.

sections.title: 7. Service stability
sections.body: Our technical team works around the clock to keep the platform available at 99%. If an outage occurs beyond our control (for example, global cloud providers), we will notify you immediately and work to resolve it quickly.

terms.closing: We're here to support your success! If you have any questions about these terms, our support team is always ready to help.
terms.acceptLabel: I agree to the Terms of Use Agreement.
terms.acceptRequired: Please accept the terms to continue.
